original_text: Then he went out to the gateway, where another servant girl saw him and said to the people there, “This fellow was with Jesus of Nazareth.”
korean_text: 앞문까지 나아가니 다른 여종이 그를 보고 거기 있는 사람들에게 말하되 이 사람은 나사렛 예수와 함께 있었도다 하매

sentences.original_text: Then he went out to the gateway
where another servant girl saw him
and said to the people there
This fellow was with Jesus of Nazareth
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람은 나사렛 예수와 함께 있었습니다
